query:
UPDATE island_guides SET 
  quickFacts = '["Population: ~200,000","Currency: Maldivian Rufiyaa (MVR)","Language: Dhivehi","Time Zone: GMT+5","Airport: Velana International","Best Months: Nov-Apr"]',
  topThingsToDo = '["Visit Friday Mosque","Explore Male City Centre","Shop at Local Markets","Relax at Artificial Beach","Visit National Centre","Try Local Cuisine"]',
  snorkelingGuide = '{"spots":["Banana Reef","Artificial Reef"],"difficulty":"Beginner to Intermediate","tips":"Book tours from Male city, best in morning"}',
  divingGuide = '{"sites":["Banana Reef","Artificial Reef","HP Reef"],"difficulty":"All Levels","tips":"Multiple dive shops in Male offering PADI courses"}',
  foodCafes = '["Haveeru Restaurant","Seagull Cafe & Restaurant","Octopus Cafe","Local Fish Market","Street Food Stalls"]',
  currency = 'Maldivian Rufiyaa (MVR)',
  language = 'Dhivehi, English',
  whatToPack = '["Light clothing","Sun protection","Swimwear","Comfortable shoes","Camera","Medications"]',
  healthTips = '["Drink plenty of water","Use high SPF sunscreen","Stay hydrated","Avoid tap water in some areas","Travel insurance recommended"]',
  emergencyContacts = '["Police: 119","Ambulance: 102","Fire: 118","Tourist Police: +960 3301234"]',
  threeDayItinerary = '["Day 1: Arrive at airport, transfer to Male, explore city centre and markets","Day 2: Snorkeling or diving tour, visit Friday Mosque, dinner at local restaurant","Day 3: Island hopping tour or beach relaxation, shopping, depart"]',
  faq = '["Q: Is Male safe? A: Yes, Male is generally safe for tourists","Q: What is the best time to visit? A: November to April","Q: Do I need a visa? A: Most nationalities get 30-day visa on arrival","Q: What currency is used? A: Maldivian Rufiyaa (MVR)"]'
WHERE slug = 'male-capital-city';

UPDATE island_guides SET 
  quickFacts = '["Population: ~2,500","Known for: Local island experience","Best for: Budget travelers","Activities: Snorkeling, diving, water sports","Accommodation: Guesthouses","Dining: Local restaurants"]',
  topThingsToDo = '["Snorkeling at nearby reefs","Diving expeditions","Beach volleyball","Visit local markets","Try local seafood","Water sports activities"]',
  snorkelingGuide = '{"spots":["House Reef","Banana Reef","Local Reefs"],"difficulty":"Beginner to Intermediate","tips":"Excellent snorkeling right from the beach, guides available"}',
  divingGuide = '{"sites":["House Reef","Banana Reef","Artificial Reef"],"difficulty":"All Levels","tips":"Multiple dive shops offer courses and guided dives"}',
  foodCafes = '["Local Restaurants","Beach Cafes","Seafood Grills","Bakeries","Juice Shops"]',
  currency = 'Maldivian Rufiyaa (MVR)',
  language = 'Dhivehi, English',
  whatToPack = '["Swimwear","Snorkeling gear (optional)","Sun protection","Light clothing","Reef shoes","Camera"]',
  healthTips = '["Drink plenty of water","Use reef-safe sunscreen","Avoid touching corals","Respect marine life","Stay hydrated"]',
  emergencyContacts = '["Local Police: 119","Island Chief: Contact guesthouse","Nearest Hospital: Male"]',
  threeDayItinerary = '["Day 1: Arrive, settle in guesthouse, explore island","Day 2: Full day snorkeling or diving tour","Day 3: Beach relaxation, local market visit, depart"]',
  faq = '["Q: Is Maafushi good for beginners? A: Yes, excellent for first-time snorkelers","Q: What are guesthouse prices? A: Budget-friendly, $30-80 per night","Q: Can I do water sports? A: Yes, many options available"]'
WHERE slug = 'maafushi-island';

UPDATE island_guides SET 
  quickFacts = '["Known as: Surfing Capital of Maldives","Best Season: March to October","Wave Height: 4-8 feet","Breaks: Left and right handers","Accommodation: Surf resorts and guesthouses","Vibe: Laid-back surfer community"]',
  topThingsToDo = '["Surfing at main break","Snorkeling","Diving","Visit local restaurants","Beach relaxation","Photography"]',
  snorkelingGuide = '{"spots":["House Reef","Local Reefs"],"difficulty":"Beginner to Intermediate","tips":"Good snorkeling available, less crowded than other islands"}',
  divingGuide = '{"sites":["House Reef","Local Dive Sites"],"difficulty":"All Levels","tips":"Dive shops available, good for all skill levels"}',
  foodCafes = '["Surf Cafes","Local Restaurants","Beach Bars","Juice Shops","Bakeries"]',
  currency = 'Maldivian Rufiyaa (MVR)',
  language = 'Dhivehi, English',
  whatToPack = '["Surfboard (or rent)","Wetsuit (optional)","Sun protection","Swimwear","Casual clothing","Camera"]',
  healthTips = '["Use reef-safe sunscreen","Stay hydrated","Respect local culture","Avoid touching corals","Sea safety awareness"]',
  emergencyContacts = '["Local Police: 119","Island Chief: Contact resort","Nearest Hospital: Male"]',
  threeDayItinerary = '["Day 1: Arrive, check in, scout the breaks","Day 2: Full day surfing, relax at cafe","Day 3: Optional morning session, explore island, depart"]',
  faq = '["Q: Best time to surf? A: March to October","Q: Can beginners learn? A: Yes, schools available","Q: What is the vibe? A: Relaxed, friendly surfer community"]'
WHERE slug = 'thulusdhoo-island';

UPDATE island_guides SET 
  quickFacts = '["Type: Atoll reef","Depth: 5-40 meters","Marine Life: Abundant","Visibility: 20-40 meters","Best For: Diving and snorkeling","Accessibility: Day trips from Male"]',
  topThingsToDo = '["Diving expeditions","Snorkeling tours","Marine life photography","Coral garden exploration","Fish watching"]',
  snorkelingGuide = '{"spots":["Banana Reef Main","Banana Reef East"],"difficulty":"Intermediate","tips":"World-class snorkeling, best with guide, strong currents possible"}',
  divingGuide = '{"sites":["Banana Reef","Coral Gardens","Fish School"],"difficulty":"Intermediate to Advanced","tips":"Famous for manta rays and reef sharks, excellent visibility"}',
  foodCafes = '["Resorts only","Bring snacks for day trips"]',
  currency = 'Maldivian Rufiyaa (MVR)',
  language = 'Dhivehi, English',
  whatToPack = '["Snorkeling/diving gear","Wetsuit","Sun protection","Waterproof camera","Towel","Snacks"]',
  healthTips = '["Respect marine life","Use reef-safe sunscreen","Avoid touching corals","Stay with guide","Dive safety protocols"]',
  emergencyContacts = '["Dive Master: On tour","Nearest Hospital: Male","Emergency: 102"]',
  threeDayItinerary = '["Day 1: Book tour from Male","Day 2: Full day diving/snorkeling at Banana Reef","Day 3: Optional second dive or return to Male"]',
  faq = '["Q: Is it good for beginners? A: Snorkeling yes, diving needs certification","Q: What marine life? A: Manta rays, sharks, tropical fish","Q: Best time? A: November to April"]'
WHERE slug = 'banana-reef';

UPDATE island_guides SET 
  quickFacts = '["Known for: Whale shark encounters","Season: June to November","Island Type: Resort island","Accommodation: Luxury resorts","Best For: Families and adventure seekers","Activities: Water sports, island hopping"]',
  topThingsToDo = '["Whale shark watching","Snorkeling","Diving","Island hopping","Beach relaxation","Local island visits"]',
  snorkelingGuide = '{"spots":["House Reef","Whale Shark Zone","Local Reefs"],"difficulty":"Beginner to Intermediate","tips":"Excellent for whale shark season, professional guides available"}',
  divingGuide = '{"sites":["House Reef","Whale Shark Dives","Coral Gardens"],"difficulty":"All Levels","tips":"Whale shark dives available in season, unforgettable experience"}',
  foodCafes = '["Resort Restaurants","Beach Bars","Local Cafes"]',
  currency = 'Maldivian Rufiyaa (MVR)',
  language = 'Dhivehi, English',
  whatToPack = '["Swimwear","Sun protection","Snorkeling gear","Camera","Casual clothing","Reef shoes"]',
  healthTips = '["Use reef-safe sunscreen","Stay hydrated","Respect marine life","Avoid touching whale sharks","Follow guide instructions"]',
  emergencyContacts = '["Resort: 24/7 assistance","Nearest Hospital: Ari Atoll","Emergency: 102"]',
  threeDayItinerary = '["Day 1: Arrive by flight, settle at resort, relax","Day 2: Whale shark watching tour, snorkeling","Day 3: Island hopping or beach day, depart"]',
  faq = '["Q: Can I touch whale sharks? A: No, observe from distance","Q: Best time for whale sharks? A: June to November","Q: Is it family-friendly? A: Yes, excellent for families"]'
WHERE slug = 'dhigurah-island';

UPDATE island_guides SET 
  quickFacts = '["Type: Local island","Population: ~1,200","Known for: Authentic culture","Accommodation: Guesthouses","Best For: Cultural experience","Activities: Diving, local exploration"]',

  currency = 'Maldivian Rufiyaa (MVR)',
  language = 'Dhivehi, English',

  faq = '["Q: Is it safe? A: Yes, very welcoming to tourists","Q: What is the culture like? A: Traditional Maldivian, very friendly","Q: Good for diving? A: Yes, excellent diving opportunities"]'
WHERE slug = 'ukulhas-island';

UPDATE island_guides SET 
  quickFacts = '["Known for: Pristine lagoon","Beach Type: White sand","Accommodation: Luxury resorts","Best For: Relaxation and romance","Activities: Snorkeling, water sports","Vibe: Peaceful and exclusive"]',
